text: @mgafni Wish we could look into this guy #EdAschoff from Early December! Young #ESPN reporter 34. Battled a virus had unknown underlying condition that contributed but sure sounds like #Covid19! If true that places the virus here in Nov of 19 https://t.co/COvDOZdqrZ
